description.en: Adds support for MiJia Gateways child devices and Mi WiFi devices
description.nl: Voegt ondersteuning toe voor MiJia Gateways-kinderapparaten en Mi WiFi-apparaten

title.en: Long press and release button switch
title.nl: Druk lang op de knopschakelaar en laat hem los

hint.en:
Here you can specify after what time the alarm signal from the motion sensor will be stopped, if a motion is detected it is not detected. Usually this is for 60 seconds, you can set from 5 to 86400 seconds. 
 
 Attention! Values less than 60 seconds are relevant only for independently modified sensors that have the ability to transmit information about the movement with a frequency of 5 seconds.

hint.en:
Here you can specify after what time the alarm signal from the motion sensor will be stopped, if a motion is detected it is not detected. Usually this is for 60 seconds, you can set from 5 to 86400 seconds. 
 
 Attention! Values less than 60 seconds are relevant only for independently modified sensors that have the ability to transmit information about the movement with a frequency of 5 seconds.
Here you can specify the refresh interval for capabilities. Usually it is 60 seconds, you can set from 1 to 86400 seconds.

label.en: Duration of the natural gas detected alarm

hint.en: Here you can specify after what time the alarm signal from the natural gas sensor will be stopped, if a natural gas is detected it is not detected. Usually this is for 60 seconds, you can set from 60 to 86400 seconds.

label.en: Duration of the smoke detected alarm

hint.en: Here you can specify after what time the alarm signal from the smoke detected sensor will be stopped, if a smoke detected is detected it is not detected. Usually this is for 60 seconds, you can set from 60 to 86400 seconds.

Here you can specify after what time the alarm signal from the motion sensor will be stopped, if a motion is detected it is not detected. Usually this is for 60 seconds, you can set from 60 to 86400 seconds.

Here you can specify after what time the alarm signal from the vibration sensor will be stopped, if a vibration, tilt, free fall is detected it is not detected. Usually this is for 60 seconds, you can set from 60 to 86400 seconds.
